snippet: Pilobolus Dance Theater opened its four-week season at the Joyce Theater with two new works that were a testament to the resilience of the company’s style.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by Pilobolus Dance Theater, including New York premieres of works by Sidi Larbi Cherkaoui and Trish Sie, at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: Pilobolus Dance Theater opened its four-week season at the Joyce Theater with two new works that were a testament to the resilience of the company’s style.

headline.seo: Pilobolus Dance Theater at Joyce Theater
headline.main: Would You Rather Tango or Be a Robot? Either Way, the Bodies Stack Up
headline.print_headline: Would You Rather Tango or Be a Robot? Either Way, the Bodies Stack Up
